### Work
I am currently working for a company located in beijing china called qunar 
which is probably the largest online travel info platform in china !

### Code

life.live("long enough to understand the meaning of life...")
life.end();

### Motto

{% endblockquote %}

Post.title: Hexo-Guide
Post._content:
Welcome to [Hexo](https://hexo.io/)! This is your very first post. Check [documentation](https://hexo.io/docs/) for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in [troubleshooting](https://hexo.io/docs/troubleshooting.html) or you can ask me on [GitHub](https://github.com/hexojs/hexo/issues).

## Quick Start
{% centerquote %} 引言... {% endcenterquote %}
{% cq %} 引言...short version {% endcq %}

###test 图片

/images/IMG_6287.JPG

![/images/IMG_6322.JPG](/images/IMG_6322.JPG)


### Create a new post

``` bash
$ hexo new "My New Post"
```

More info: [Writing](https://hexo.io/docs/writing.html)

### Run server

``` bash
$ hexo server
```

More info: [Server](https://hexo.io/docs/server.html)

### Generate static files

``` bash
$ hexo generate
```

More info: [Generating](https://hexo.io/docs/generating.html)

### Deploy to remote sites

``` bash
$ hexo deploy
```

More info: [Deployment](https://hexo.io/docs/deployment.html)

Welcome to [Hexo](https://hexo.io/)! This is your very first post. Check [documentation](https://hexo.io/docs/) for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in [troubleshooting](https://hexo.io/docs/troubleshooting.html) or you can ask me on [GitHub](https://github.com/hexojs/hexo/issues).

## Quick Start

### Create a new post

``` bash
$ hexo new "My New Post"
```

More info: [Writing](https://hexo.io/docs/writing.html)

### Run server

``` bash
$ hexo server
```

More info: [Server](https://hexo.io/docs/server.html)

### Generate static files

``` bash
$ hexo generate
```

More info: [Generating](https://hexo.io/docs/generating.html)

### Deploy to remote sites

``` bash
$ hexo deploy
```

More info: [Deployment](https://hexo.io/docs/deployment.html)

Post.title: Hexo-Tags
Post.content:
In this article, We’ll talk a little bit hexo tag plugins, To help you munipulate you blog easily!

add a quote

Do not just seek happiness for yourself. Seek happiness for all. Through kindness. Through mercy.

David Levithan, Wide Awake万的个人网站

add a youtubu video

include a code file

adding a caption and a URL to a codeblock

you wanna quote something, you’d better place it here!

add a iframe

If certain content is causing processing issues in your posts, wrap it with the raw tag to avoid rendering errors.

mail to me

kriswansf@gmail.com
